summary: This document contains email correspondence regarding scheduling a breakfast meeting involving Jeffrey Epstein and other associates. Amanda Kirby, an associate at Deutsche Bank, is coordinating the meeting with Lesley Groff and mentions Caroline Kitidis, who has previously met with Epstein.
